info.name: List
info.description: Provides an automated solution to clients who would like to manage lists. This API provides methods to view, add, update or delete lists.

item.name: Get the lists for a given category ID

query.description: Page number starting from 1

request.description: Returns the lists for the category

response.name: Successfully got all lists of list category

item.name: Get all lists for the given company

query.description: Filter capabilities for Category Type. Supports the equals and not equals operators.
Filter capabilities to show deleted lists. Supports the equals operator.
Filter capabilities for Level Count. Supports the equals, less than, less than or equal to, greater than, greater than or equal to operators.
